text: Fresh from the Farm is a 1915 short comedy film starring Harold Lloyd. ==Plot== A farm youth goes to college, pursues the pretty co-eds and joins a fraternity. ==Cast== * Harold Lloyd as Lonesome Luke * Gene Marsh * Elsie Greeson * Jack Spinks * Arthur Harrison ==See also== * Harold Lloyd filmography *List of films of 1915 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1915 films Category:1915 comedy films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1915 short films Category:American silent short films Category:Films directed by Hal Roach Category:Lonesome Luke films Category:Comedy short films
title: Fresh from the Farm
